tagline: Short Term Observational Radio Communications project
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body:
Short Term Observational Radio Communications (STORC) is a Bachelors Senior Project developed to meet the requirements for the Computer and Electrical Engineering Bachelors Degree program at the University of Utah.

http://www.storc.us/

Team Members:

Kyle Hutchings (Electrical and Computer Engineering) khutchings85@gmail.com
James Murdock (Electrical and Computer Engineering) james.murdock@utah.edu
Joe Grantham (Electrical Engineering) granthamjoe2@gmail.com
Neil Davis (Electrical Engineering) neil.davis@utah.edu
John Wells (Computer Science) john.wells@utah.edu
name: Project STORC
